001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa;
002
003public class POASubmissionSelected {
004  private final POASubmission submission;
005
006  public POASubmissionSelected(POASubmission submission) {
007    this.submission = submission;
008  }
009
010  public POASubmission getSubmission() {
011    return submission;
012  }
013
014  @Override
015  public String toString() {
016    return "Submission selected: " + getSubmission();
017  }
018}
